languages.text: Протекторат династии фон Валанциус оправляется от кризиса, а значит — вновь представляет интерес для хищнических действий извне. Чтобы не вводить в искушение крупных игроков Простора Коронус, Вольному Торговцу рекомендуется поскорее заявить о своем праве на наследие Теодоры.

traits.locale_text: Торговая империя династии фон Валанциус оправляется от кризиса, а значит — вновь представляет интерес для хищнических действий извне. Чтобы не вводить в искушение крупных игроков Простора Коронус, Вольному Торговцу рекомендуется поскорее заявить о своем праве на наследие Теодоры.

languages.text: The von Valancius protectorate is emerging from a crisis, but that means it is once again an interesting prospect for external predators. To avoid leading the major players of the Koronus Expanse into temptation, the Rogue Trader should assert {mf|his|her} right to Theodora's legacy.
languages.original_text: Протекторат династии фон Валанциус оправляется от кризиса, а значит — вновь представляет интерес для хищнических действий извне. Чтобы не вводить в искушение крупных игроков Простора Коронус, Вольному Торговцу рекомендуется поскорее заявить о своем праве на наследие Теодоры.

traits.locale_text: The von Valancius trade empire is emerging from a crisis, but that means it is once again an interesting prospect for external predators. To avoid leading the major players of the Koronus Expanse into temptation, the Rogue Trader should assert {mf|his|her} right to Theodora's legacy.

The von Valancius trade empire is emerging from a crisis, but that means it is once again an interesting prospect for external predators. To avoid leading the major players of the Koronus Expanse into temptation, the Rogue Trader should assert {mf|his|her} right to Theodora's legacy.

The von Valancius trade empire is emerging from a crisis, but that means it is once again an interesting prospect for external predators. To avoid leading the major players of the Koronus Expanse into temptation, the Rogue Trader should assert {mf|his|her} right to Theodora's legacy.

The von Valancius protectorate is emerging from a crisis, but that means it is once again an interesting prospect for external predators. To avoid leading the major players of the Koronus Expanse into temptation, the Rogue Trader should assert {mf|his|her} right to Theodora's legacy.

languages.text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝正在从危机中恢复元气，但这也意味着它将再次成为外来掠夺者的目标。为了避免引起科罗努斯扩区主要势力的觊觎，行商浪人应当坚称{mf|他|她}有权继承西奥多拉的遗产。
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate is emerging from a crisis, but that means it is once again an interesting prospect for external predators. To avoid leading the major players of the Koronus Expanse into temptation, the Rogue Trader should assert {mf|his|her} right to Theodora's legacy.

traits.locale_text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝正在从危机中恢复元气，但这也意味着它将再次成为外来掠夺者的目标。为了避免引起科罗努斯扩区主要势力的觊觎，行商浪人应当坚称{mf|他|她}有权继承西奥多拉的遗产。

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領は危機から脱しつつあるが、それは外部のプレデターにとっては、興味深い見通しであることを意味する。コロヌス・エクスパンスの主要なプレイヤーを誘惑に導くことを避けるために、自由開拓者はシオドーラの遺産に対する自身の権利を主張しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate is emerging from a crisis, but that means it is once again an interesting prospect for external predators. To avoid leading the major players of the Koronus Expanse into temptation, the Rogue Trader should assert {mf|his|her} right to Theodora's legacy.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領は危機から脱しつつあるが、それは外部のプレデターにとっては、興味深い見通しであることを意味する。コロヌス・エクスパンスの主要なプレイヤーを誘惑に導くことを避けるために、自由開拓者はシオドーラの遺産に対する自身の権利を主張しなければならない。

languages.text: El protectorado von Valancius acaba de superar una crisis, pero eso solo lo convierte en un objetivo tentador para los depredadores externos. Para evitar que las potencias de la Extensión de Koronus decidan aprovechar la oportunidad, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debería anunciar su derecho al legado de Theodora.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate is emerging from a crisis, but that means it is once again an interesting prospect for external predators. To avoid leading the major players of the Koronus Expanse into temptation, the Rogue Trader should assert {mf|his|her} right to Theodora's legacy.

traits.locale_text: El protectorado von Valancius acaba de superar una crisis, pero eso solo lo convierte en un objetivo tentador para los depredadores externos. Para evitar que las potencias de la Extensión de Koronus decidan aprovechar la oportunidad, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debería anunciar su derecho al legado de Theodora.

languages.text: Das Protektorat derer von Valancius erholt sich von einer Krise und rückt damit einmal mehr in das Zentrum des Interesses externer Invasoren. Um die bedeutenden Häuser der Koronus-Ausdehnung nicht in Versuchung zu führen, sollte {mf|der Freihändler seinen|die Freihändlerin ihren} Anspruch auf Theodoras Vermächtnis geltend machen.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate is emerging from a crisis, but that means it is once again an interesting prospect for external predators. To avoid leading the major players of the Koronus Expanse into temptation, the Rogue Trader should assert {mf|his|her} right to Theodora's legacy.

traits.locale_text: Das Protektorat derer von Valancius erholt sich von einer Krise und rückt damit einmal mehr in das Zentrum des Interesses externer Invasoren. Um die bedeutenden Häuser der Koronus-Ausdehnung nicht in Versuchung zu führen, sollte {mf|der Freihändler seinen|die Freihändlerin ihren} Anspruch auf Theodoras Vermächtnis geltend machen.

languages.text: Le protectorat von Valancius sort d'une crise, mais cela signifie qu'il constitue à nouveau une cible de choix pour les prédateurs extérieurs. Pour éviter que les principaux acteurs des Étendues de Koronus s'y intéressent de trop près, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} devrait faire valoir ses droits sur l'héritage de Théodora.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate is emerging from a crisis, but that means it is once again an interesting prospect for external predators. To avoid leading the major players of the Koronus Expanse into temptation, the Rogue Trader should assert {mf|his|her} right to Theodora's legacy.

traits.locale_text: Le protectorat von Valancius sort d'une crise, mais cela signifie qu'il constitue à nouveau une cible de choix pour les prédateurs extérieurs. Pour éviter que les principaux acteurs des Étendues de Koronus s'y intéressent de trop près, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} devrait faire valoir ses droits sur l'héritage de Théodora.

languages.text: Von Valancius protektorası, içinde bulunduğu krizi atlatmaya çalışıyor. Bu da onu, köşe başında bekleyen avcıların gözünde yine potansiyel bir ava dönüştürüyor. Hür Tacir, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki baş aktörlerin bir şeye cüret etmesini engellemek için Theodora'nın mirasının onun hakkı olduğunu göstermeli.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate is emerging from a crisis, but that means it is once again an interesting prospect for external predators. To avoid leading the major players of the Koronus Expanse into temptation, the Rogue Trader should assert {mf|his|her} right to Theodora's legacy.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius protektorası bir krizden çıkma sürecinde ve bu da onu, dışarıdan gelecek avcılar için bir kez daha potansiyel bir av hâline getiriyor. Hür Tacir, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki önemli oyuncuların böyle bir şeye cüret etmesini engellemek için Theodora'nın mirasının onun hakkı olduğunu göstermeli.
